rules.description: 键盘模拟鼠标 left_control+i触发, hjkl移动,空格左击,n右击
更方便的修饰键 ASDF = ;LKJ = ⇧⌃⌥⌘ 单键两键或三键组合长按
光标定位(外置键盘),left_control+[hjkl(方向),np(翻页),o(退格)] Shift+Enter(换行)
光标定位,Hyper+[hjkl(方向),np(翻页),o(退格)],opt+hjkl(字方向), Shift+Enter(换行)
双击⌃,chrome等应用内窗口tab切换(^+`)
窗口管理,[left_control,hyper]+backslash = 窗口居左居右切换
窗口管理,[left_control,hyper]+[ins,del,home,end,pgup,pgdn,up,down,left,right,m] = 窗口六边角,四角,最大化

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "D01601A3-7A25-464C-BBDD-0316BCE235F4"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "D01601A3-7A25-464C-BBDD-0316BCE235F4"'

rules.description: 长按 X,C,V => 剪切,拷贝,粘贴
长按capslock = right_control, 单击 = escape
长按空格键 = Shfit,单击映射至空格键
